name: RTT - RunningThroughTunnels
description:
Can't you read the title????

No! Wait!! I didn't want to come off as impolite!!

Please stay and enjoy running... through tunnels...

But the music is alright :)

Mouse to move left, middle or right, arrow-keys work, but not recommended!!

EDIT: This is a reworked version a few days after the onehourgamejam which it was originally created for. I added some pseudo 3d tunnel effect to make the title less confusing...

EDIT 2: Reworked again, fixed the perspective, looks waaay better now
